review: **** ***** ******* Listens and suggests very empathetically. Was sharp on time and suggested diagnosis and medicine worked very well.

The doctor is very clear about eveything. *** ********* ** ** *** *** **** * **** ***** Had no progress with my previous orthopedician inspite of doing eveything i was asked to, so did my own research and went to him. Never gave me unwanted medicines directly. Prescribed tests based on his suspicion and close analysis of my symtoms and very clearly knew what my previous doctor missed since the start. Took the time and clearly explained it to me that it wasn't my spine causing issues but my pelvis and clarified it thru tests and as per reports he has directed me in the right direction. I have been a patient all my life ever since i remember a** ** ** ******* *** ** *** **** *** *** **** ******* ****** * **** *****

Doctor was very friendly. He did a thorough testing of points where pain is happening. He explained the issue very well and have minimal medications. 
I would highly recommend the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Venkat as I was suspecting fracture in my ankle because of a door falling on it. The doctor was really patient and friendly. He tapped on my foot to understand centers of pain and advised some rest and medicine. He did not advise an xray, but did do it on my insistence and once it was clear there was no damage I was relieved and his diagnosis was very accurate. Overall, I found him to be very genuine, he did advise me quickly on some other ortho related issues as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Doctor was very friendly and patient. Took time to study the scans and explain the issues. Did not hurry at all, even though other patients were waiting. Answered every query raised.

The clinic could ideally give preference to patients with prior appointments over walk-ins.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had injured my ankle while travelling. I visited Dr. Venkatdeep. He explained the problem with my ankle. Asked me to observe for 3 to 4 days if I have any swelling I need to come back and take an X-ray which I did. It was ligament tare which he found out and explained what needs to be done and how I need to take care of the injury. He explains very well.

I highly recommend Dr. Venkatdeep to my friends and Family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had an injury while traveling and ended up being misguided by some local doctor there. Came back to Bangalore to visit Dr. venkatdeep and he explained the problem to me, and also treated it well. He explained the issues in a way that makes it easy for anyone to understand.

Will totally recommend Dr. Venkatdeep to my friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I fell down and had severe back pain, doctor did a great job of treating me, did xray and helped to understand the problems , explained well, given very less medicines, i am very happy and refer him to my friends. this is my second experience with him, he never prescribes medicines unnecessarily and treats very well.
regards
sam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very pleasant doctor indeed. He was patient, observant and asked lots of questions and took the time to assess and explain the possible cause and effect of my condition. Did not feel rushed at all, which is the level of service one would expect from doctors but rarely these days. 
Love the cleanliness of the clinic and waiting area, the other staff were wonderful and helpful too.
**** ***** ******* Listens and suggests very empathetically. Was sharp on time and suggested diagnosis and medicine worked very well.
